name: Deepak Mathews Koshy
bio: Software Developer with experience in building cross platform mobile applications using Flutter. Deployed multiple apps to Google Play Store and Apple App Store

top_projects.description: Megaflixz is a movie app for the movie lover in you. Includes all new and upcoming movies and TV series. Also has an option to save movies to watch later list

readme_content: # Hi, I am Deepak Mathews Koshy - 🔭 I’m currently working on App development using Flutter, backend development with Python FastAPI - 🌱 I’m currently learning React.js - 👯 I’m looking to collaborate on interesting Flutter and Node.js projects - 📫 How to reach me: Email Me ## Connect with me: [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/.-LinkedIn-Blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=linkedin&color=0e76a8)](https://www.linkedin.com/in/deepakmkoshy/) [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/@deepakmkoshy-Instagram-Blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=instagram&color=DD2A7B)](https://www.instagram.com/deepakmkoshy/) [![Twitter Follow](https://img.shields.io/twitter/follow/DeepakKoshy301?color=08a0e9&logo=twitter&style=for-the-badge)](https://twitter.com/DeepakKoshy301) ## Github Stats [![Stats](https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api?username=deepakmkoshy&&show_icons=true&title_color=ffffff&icon_color=bb2acf&text_color=daf7dc&bg_color=151515)](https://github.com/deepakmkoshy) [![Top Langs](https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api/top-langs/?username=deepakmkoshy&&show_icons=true&title_color=ffffff&icon_color=bb2acf&text_color=daf7dc&bg_color=151515)](https://github.com/deepakmkoshy)

rijfas/generator.js.summary: Significant activity has been observed in the generator.js repository with recent enhancements to validator template generation, data serialization, and template files for Express.js API generation.

rijfas/generator.js-cli.summary: Notable development has been reported in the generator.js-cli repository with the creation of an npm package generator and major updates to the package name and repository cloning logic.

deepakmkoshy/deepakmkoshy.summary: A minor update was made to the README.md file in the deepakmkoshy repository on February 17, 2025.

profile_summary: As a seasoned software developer with a strong presence on GitHub, I'm Deepak Mathews Koshy. With over 52 public repositories and 56 followers, I've established myself as a trusted member of the developer community. My technical expertise lies in building cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter, with multiple apps successfully deployed on Google Play Store and Apple App Store. I'm continuously working on enhancing my skills, currently focusing on backend development with Python FastAPI, while also exploring React.js.
